attributes.action: To support students through this crisis we are people like anyone else.
attributes.additional_details: It could be universal credit or some form of help during this crisis but us students need some sort of financial help like everyone else. I have food to buy and my student finance doesn’t cover the rent which is due in a month. So I want government and Parliament to protect us durning this crisis as some of us will go through financial hardship if we get no help.
attributes.background: Being a student many of us work in pubs and restaurants the things that have been closed, many on 0 hours or 4 hour contracts (I average 16-20).I’ve been informed I will only be paid 4 hours a week while closed.Therefore I am asking the government while we are shut to open universal credit up to us.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304298

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
